member.name: M:Jellyfin.Xtream.Service.StreamService.ParseName(System.String)
member.summary:
Parses tags in the name of a stream entry. The name commonly contains tags of the forms:
[TAG]
|TAG|
These tags are parsed and returned as separate strings. The returned title is cleaned from tags and trimmed.
member.param: The name which should be parsed.
member.returns: A struct containing the cleaned title and parsed tags.

member.summary: Gets the media source information for the given Xtream stream.
member.param: The unique identifier of the stream.
The container extension of the stream.
Boolean indicating whether or not restreaming is used.
The datetime representing the start time of catcup TV.
The duration in minutes of the catcup TV stream.
The Xtream video info if known.
The Xtream audio info if known.
member.returns: The media source info as class.

member.name: M:Jellyfin.Xtream.Service.StreamService.TagRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\[([^\\]]+)\\]|\\|([^\\|]+)\\|
Explanation:
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '['.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character other than ']' atomically at least once.
○ Match ']'.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '|'.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character other than '|' atomically at least once.
○ Match '|'.
